allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add login path to onboarding arrival screen

Split the arrival screen into two paths: "Get Started" for new users
and "Already have an account? Log in" for returning users. The login
path skips onboarding steps and shows a LoginView directly.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
